title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not always work
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, when I create a new file f1.txt and select Close All Saved from the file menu, the expected behavior does not always occur.
EB: The expected behavior is that all open files should be closed and saved, but this does not always happen.
SR:
1. Open build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file f1.txt.
3. Select Close All Saved from the file menu.
